kpi.name: RNC_509a

kpi_info.title: RRC CONNECTION DROPS DURING INTER SYST HHO CAUSED BY UE TX PWR NRT
kpi_info.use: The number of RRC connection drops during inter-system handover caused by UE transmission power for NRT.
